Description: Set of [node](https://spine-project.github.io/SpineOpt.jl/latest/concept_reference/Object%20Classes/#node) objects in the model

Tuple of all objects, for which the parameter is defined
Set of indexes for navigating an array value
Set of specific time-indexes for navigating a time-varying value

Set of tuples of unit and node being defined under the relationship [unit__to_node](https://spine-project.github.io/SpineOpt.jl/latest/concept_reference/Relationship%20Classes/#unit__to_node) or [unit__from_node](https://spine-project.github.io/SpineOpt.jl/latest/concept_reference/Relationship%20Classes/#unit__from_node)

Set of tuples of unit, node and unit constraint being defined under the relationship [unit\_\_to_node\_\_unit_constraint](https://spine-project.github.io/SpineOpt.jl/latest/concept_reference/Relationship%20Classes/#unit__to_node__unit_constraint) or [unit\_\_from_node\_\_unit_constraint](https://spine-project.github.io/SpineOpt.jl/latest/concept_reference/Relationship%20Classes/#unit__from_node__unit_constraint)

Set of tuples of connection, node and unit constraint being defined under the relationship [connection\_\_to_node\_\_unit_constraint](https://spine-project.github.io/SpineOpt.jl/latest/concept_reference/Relationship%20Classes/#connection__to_node__unit_constraint) or [connection\_\_from_node\_\_unit_constraint](https://spine-project.github.io/SpineOpt.jl/latest/concept_reference/Relationship%20Classes/#connection__from_node__unit_constraint)
